      • getContent

        public static java.io.InputStream getContent(java.lang.String user,
                             java.lang.String docPath,
                             boolean checkout,
                             boolean extendedSecurity)
                                      throws java.io.IOException,
                                             PathNotFoundException,
                                             AccessDeniedException,
                                             DatabaseException
        Retrieve the content input stream from a document
        参数:
        user - The user who make the content petition.
        docPath - Path of the document to get the content.
        checkout - If the content is retrieved due to a checkout or not.
        extendedSecurity - If the extended security DOWNLOAD permission should be evaluated. This is used to enable the document preview.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
        PathNotFoundException
        AccessDeniedException
        DatabaseException

      • hasWorkflowNodes

        public static boolean hasWorkflowNodes(java.lang.String docUuid)
                                throws WorkflowException,
                                       PathNotFoundException,
                                       DatabaseException
        Check if a node is being used in a running workflow
        抛出:
        WorkflowException
        PathNotFoundException
        DatabaseException
